title: Far Cry 1 [PC game] image file
description:
Far Cry 1
*********
                             
Game for PC.
Copied DVD-ROM as an image file.
Labelled:-UBISOFT/CRYTEK.
Game type:- First person shooter.
Delivered in rar folder containing 1 image file [MDS & MDF] and 1 text document on how to install.

Requirements.
98/VISTA/XP [64bit patches for AMD Athlon64 with XP 64bit edition].
1GHz CPU.
256MB RAM.

Extract the rar folder and mount the image with a virtual machine, I recommend Daemon Tools.
Once Daemon tools has installed, simply hover your mouse over the icon on the taskbar, right click and go-to Virtual CD/DVD-ROM > device > click on Mount Image and install the game, finally install the patches, theres one for 32bit and two for 64bit. [exe files].

Keep the image mounted to play.

If you haven't got a rar extractor installed then download one from the link below, I recommend 7Zip, once 7Zip has installed simply right click on the downloaded rar folder > 7Zip > extract here.

Also download Daemon Tools from the link as well.
 <a href="
http://www.filehippo.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.filehippo.com/</a>

ADVICE..DONT DELETE RAR FOLDERS AS THEY MAKE GOOD BACKUP SOURCES.

Contact me for help.
